text: is a Japanese athlete. He is best known as a figure skater from Japan. Oda is a descendant of Oda Nobunaga who was an important daimyo during Japan's Sengoku period. ==Career== Oda won the 2005 World Junior Figure Skating Championships. In 2009, he was the Japanese national champion figure skater. Oda was a member of the Japanese team at the 2010 Winter Olympics at Vancouver in Canada.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "Nobunari Oda" ; Sarkar, Pritha. "Figure skater Nobunari Oda dragged down by his bootlaces," FoxNews.com (US). title: Nobunari Oda
